vision.notes: Sensory capabilities of Dentaliidae are largely unstudied; vision is presumed to be absent or rudimentary given their lifestyle as burrowing mollusks, but data is lacking.

chemoreception.notes: Likely relies on chemoreception for locating food and mates in the sediment. Inferred from general mollusk biology.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely important for detecting substrate vibrations and potential threats. Inferred from general mollusk biology.
